attributes.action: Brexit. MP’s must stop putting their own interests before those of the country.
attributes.additional_details: Had all MP’s acted on the will of the people and respected the leave vote the country would have been in a much stronger negotiating position.
attributes.background: The electorate voted to leave the EU. There must not be another referendum or general election. MP’s must respect the electorates vote and start working together, and stop all this infighting and self promotion.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about there not being another EU referendum or election, but we are unsure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament as a whole to take.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/224908
